backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking product requirements to specific frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manages active section state and renders the appropriate KYL content within the AppShell.
frontend/src/components/kyl/AppShell.tsx: Provides the app’s layout, header, navigation menu, sidebar, and footer.
frontend/src/components/kyl/ContentBlock: Renders a titled content card wrapper for structured informational sections.
frontend/src/components/kyl/KeyFeaturesC: Displays an act title with a list of key legislative features using styled cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/kyl/nav.ts: Defines navigation items with labels and icons for the app’s sidebar and menus.
frontend/src/components/kyl/ScenarioCard: Shows a mediation scenario with parties, description, and resolution steps.
Renders the homepage overview with hero image, intro text, and navigation cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance, updating when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including typography and color system customizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/sections/AboutMediationSect: Renders an informational section about mediation using accordions, detailing its benefits and suitable dispute types.
frontend/src/sections/LegislativeKnowled: Displays tabbed cards summarizing key features of the Mediation Act, CPC, and Arbitration Act.
frontend/src/sections/ScenariosSection.t: Shows sample mediation scenarios with detailed dispute descriptions and step‑by‑step resolutions in accordion format.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, fonts, animations, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s schema, current state, required images, and a list of implemented features for the KYL legal awareness app. Describes architecture notes and content requirements for mediation education, legislation summaries, and scenario walkthroughs.
